title: Mobile Experiential Learning Program for Entrepreneurship Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced job-related expertise and understanding of foundational entrepreneurship concepts
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based learning modules and simplified collaboration tools to connect with professionals' practical experiences

learning_goals: Learners can improve their entrepreneurial goal-setting ability by 20% through three experiential learning simulations.
Learners improve risk-taking decision-making competencies by at least three levels on the assessment scale through team-based problem-solving activities (weekly).
Learners can collect quantitative feedback at least twice using mobile analytics tools and establish goal-adjustment strategies.

resources: Simplified collaboration platforms (e.g., KakaoTalk, Naver Works)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
